title: Completed PE Summary - H Rossey
raw_html:
Category Merchant
Type: Passenger vessel
Date 03/11/02
Incident Type: Heavy weather damage
Injuries/ fatalities: None

Synopsis

Heavy weather damage to passenger vessel.

Action taken:

The Chief Inspector of marine accidents has made the following recommendation to the owner/skipper of the vessel:

  • The lessons learnt from this accident should be promulgated through the issue of a MAIB Safety Digest article.

  • A Chief Inspector's letter should be sent to the classification society and shipbuilder bringing their attention to the failure of the bearing housings
body:
Category |   | Merchant | 
Type: |   | Passenger vessel | 
Date  |   | 03/11/02 | 
Incident Type: |   | Heavy weather damage | 
Injuries/ fatalities: |   | None | 

Synopsis

Heavy weather damage to passenger vessel. 

Action taken:

The Chief Inspector of marine accidents has made the following recommendation to the owner/skipper of the vessel: 

  * The lessons learnt from this accident should be promulgated through the issue of a MAIB Safety Digest article. 

  * A Chief Inspector's letter should be sent to the classification society and shipbuilder bringing their attention to the failure of the bearing housings 

* * *
